definition: A group of individuals who play a popular sport involving a spherical object, typically consisting of eleven members, aiming to score goals by kicking the ball with their feet into the opponent's net. This term is commonly used to refer to a team participating in organized competitions and matches.

examples.english: The soccer team won the game.

examples.german: Mein Bruder spielt in einer Fußballmannschaft.
examples.english: My brother plays in a soccer team.

examples.german: Die Fußballmannschaft trainiert zweimal pro Woche.
examples.english: The soccer team trains twice a week.
The soccer team has many fans.

examples.german: Die Fußballmannschaft hat den Pokal gewonnen.
examples.english: The soccer team won the cup.
